sn1.79:1.2: What is the abode of wealth?
sn1.79:1.4: What in the world is hard to discard?
sn1.79:1.5: By what are many beings bound
sn1.79:1.6: Like birds caught in a snare?”
sn1.79:2.2: Fortune is the abode of wealth;
sn1.79:2.4: Desire is hard to discard in the world.
sn1.79:2.5: By desire many beings are bound
sn1.79:2.6: Like birds caught in a snare. ”
